Acateo:
My name is Acateo. I came to Aden to tell everyone about the Academy.
I hasten to inform each other of the privileges of the Academy became a lot more!
First, all characters received by the Academy, get to the end of the experience bonus of 10%. Second, the increased number of Characters Mentor for using the system of Mentoring during training at the Academy. And third, if the character for admission to the Academy was the 40th level and was able to improve, he will earn extra points to the reputation of the clan.
Unexpectedly, isn't it?
Tell Your friends! And don't forget, all enrolled in the Academy will receive from me the Diadem of the Academy.
